Events.name: Radial velocity: Watching for wobble
Events.description: Orbiting planets cause stars to wobble in space, changing the color of the light astronomers observe.

effects.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 3 additional exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Transit: Searching for Shadows
Events.description: When a planet passes directly between it's star and an observer, it dims the star's light by a measureable amount.

effects.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 additional exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Direct imaging: Taking Pictures
Events.description: Astronomers can take pictures of exoplanets by removing the overwhelming glare of the stars they orbit.

effects.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 additional exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Gravitational Microlensing: Light in a Gravity Lens
Events.description: Light from a distant star is bent and focused by gravity as a planet passes between the star and Earth.

effects.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 additional exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Astrometry: Minuscule movements
Events.description: The orbit of a planet can cause a star to wobble around in space in relation to nearby stars in the sky.

effects.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 additional exoplanet you can visit.

Events.name: Database error
Events.description: The database of the navigator has incorrect positions of some exoplanets which are now out of range

effects.effects_description: You have 2 less exoplanets for visit.

Events.name: Asteroid belt
Events.description: You've appeeared inside a asteroid belt whrere you have to do a evasion movements.

effects.effects_description: You lose 20 energy

Events.name: Dangerous asteroid
Events.description: A asteroid passed too close. It scratched the hull

effects.effects_description: You lose 20 points of life.

Events.name: Huge solar storm
Events.description: A huge solar storm hit the ship causing damanges but recharging the batterys.

effects.effects_description: You lose 20 points of life and get 20 energy

Events.name: Solar storm
Events.description: Solar storm hit the ship recharging the batterys.

effects.effects_description: You get 20 energy

Events.name: A comet
Events.description: You pass near a comet. Its not relevant, but its beatifull

effects.effects_description: You dream about the beautiful space

Events.name: Asteroid impact
Events.description: A very small asteroid hit the ship causing several damage.

effects.effects_description: You lose 40 points of life.

Events.name: Inminent impact
Events.description: An asteroid is going to hit your ship. You can avoid the asteroid or prepare to the impact.

effects.effects_description: You have managed to avoid the asteroid at the last moment, you only lose 20 energy doing the maneuvers
The asteroid crashed into one of the sides of the ship, you have lost 40 life points

Events.name: Supernova
Events.description: A near star has explode into a supernova. You managed to scape unscattered

effects.effects_description: You have managed to recover some of the excess energy, gettingn 20 energy

Events.name: Too close!
Events.description: You must avoid the impact of a huge asteroid

effects.effects_description: You lose 30 of energy

Events.name: Black Hole Encounter: Gravitational Abyss
Events.description: A nearby black hole is pulling your ship closer with its intense gravitational field. You must decide how to respond.

effects.effects_description: You spend a quarter of your energy but manage to exit the danger zone
Even though you mantained course, the black hole only managed to destroy some of the outer panneling

Events.name: Distant Supernova
Events.description: A nearby supernova explosion lights up the sky, giving your crew a spectacular view and boosting morale.

effects.effects_description: You seize the opportunity to use your solar pannels, you gain 10 energy
You continue your voyage without trouble

Events.name: Nebula Crossing
Events.description: Your ship enters a dense nebula, affecting your sensors and requiring more energy to navigate.

effects.effects_description: You lose 15 energy.

Events.name: Meteor Shower
Events.description: After landing on the exoplanet, our ship encounters a meteor shower. Small impacts damage the ship's hull slightly.

effects.effects_description: Luckyly the asteroids only caused minor damage, you lose 10 life points
You managed to avoid the majority of the meteors, only suffering minimal energy and damage

Events.name: Exoplanetary Glitch
Events.description: Your ship's scanners malfunction, misidentifying the location of an exoplanet.

effects.effects_description: You lose 1 exoplanet from your visit list.
